skills.name: I Want to Help
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.\nAll Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

skills.name: Promise, Not Command
skills.desc: After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nIn addition, Svarog's <u>Counter</u> is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a <u>Counter</u>, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. Enemies adjacent to it take <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced <u>Counter(s)</u> can take effect <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> time(s).

skills.name: Because We're Family
skills.desc: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a <u>Counter</u>, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Clara's ATK.

skills.name: A Small Price for Victory
skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: A Tall Figure
eidolons.desc: Using Skill will not remove Marks of Counter on the enemy.

eidolons.name: A Tight Embrace
eidolons.desc: After using the Ultimate, ATK increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Cold Steel Armor
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Family's Warmth
eidolons.desc: After Clara is hit, the DMG taken by Clara is reduced by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. This effect lasts until the start of her next turn.

eidolons.name: A Small Promise
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Long Company
eidolons.desc: After other allies are hit, Svarog also has a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> fixed chance to trigger a Counter on the attacker and mark them with a Mark of Counter. When using Ultimate, the number of Enhanced Counters increases by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Kinship
skillTree.desc: When attacked, this character has a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.

skillTree.name: Under Protection
skillTree.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
